ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class LightSensorPoller

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.LightSensorPoller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class LightSensorPoller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Runs as a thread to collect samples from all three light sensors and characterizes colour detected by middle color sensor. Used by LightLocalization for the Odometer correction process.
    Author:
    Mustafain

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LightSensorPoller.COLOUR
      Possible color types detected by color sensor.

      static int getLeftColorVal()
      Getter for scaled sample from left color sensor.
      static int getRightColorVal()

      void run()
      Records samples from all three light sensors into colourData, colorRight and colorLeft arrays.
      static double[] tester()
      Tester for the colorvals, to calibrate for the wall and cart recognizing.
      static void updateDetectedColour(double colourRed, double colourGreen, double colourBlue)

    • Constructor Detail

      • LightSensorPoller

        public LightSensorPoller()

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Records samples from all three light sensors into colourData, colorRight and colorLeft arrays. Calls updateDetectedColour to continuously update the color detected by middle color sensor.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • getRightColorVal

        public static int getRightColorVal()
        Getter for scaled sample from right color sensor.
        Returns:
        scaled sample from right color sensor

      • getLeftColorVal

        public static int getLeftColorVal()
        Getter for scaled sample from left color sensor.
        Returns:
        scaled sample from left color sensor

      • updateDetectedColour

        public static void updateDetectedColour(double colourRed,
                                        double colourGreen,
                                        double colourBlue)
        Characterizes the color detected by the color sensor and the detectedColor variable which can be accessed using the getColor method.
        Parameters:
        colourRed - Normalized red value from color sensor
        colourGreen - Normalized green value from color sensor
        colourBlue - Normalized blue value from color sensor

      • getColor

        public static LightSensorPoller.COLOUR getColor()
        Getter for color detected by color sensor.
        Returns:
        the COLOUR type detected (GREEN, BLUE, ORANGE, YELLOW, NONE)

      • tester

        public static double[] tester()
        Tester for the colorvals, to calibrate for the wall and cart recognizing.
